name: Always run current script on server
snippet: <fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList"><Step enable="True" id="89" name="# (comment)"><Text>This ensures this script will always run on server</Text></Step><Step enable="True" id="68" name="If"><Calculation><![CDATA[not isServer]]></Calculation></Step><Step enable="True" id="164" name="Perform Script on Server"><Calculated><Calculation><![CDATA[Get ( ScriptName )]]></Calculation></Calculated><WaitForCompletion state="True"></WaitForCompletion><Calculation><![CDATA[Get ( ScriptParameter )]]></Calculation></Step><Step enable="True" id="103" name="Exit Script"><Calculation><![CDATA[Get ( ScriptResult )]]></Calculation></Step><Step enable="True" id="70" name="End If"></Step></fmxmlsnippet>
description: run the current script in a PSOS call
